solution_line_template: His total score for the 2-point shots is {points_per_2pt} x {num_2pt} = <<{points_per_2pt}*{num_2pt}={score_2pt}>>{score_2pt}.
His total score for the 3-point shots is {points_per_3pt} x {num_3pt} = <<{points_per_3pt}*{num_3pt}={score_3pt}>>{score_3pt}.
His total score for the first quarter is {score_2pt} + {score_3pt} = <<{score_2pt}+{score_3pt}={total_score}>>{total_score}.
